entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
